note.p: Buried: St Giles' cemetery, now Ascension Cemetery, Cambridge
Education: Trinity College, Cambridge; St George's Hospital. MA (Cambridge); MB (1875, Cambridge)

Career: Never practised medicine; Secretary to his father at Down (for 8 years); Lecturer in Botany, Cambridge University (1884-1888); Reader in Botany, Cambridge (1888-1904); President, British Association (1908)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1932 vol 110 pp i-xxi, plate, by Albert Charles Seward and Frederick Frost Blackman
References: James R Moore, 'On the Education of Darwin's Sons: The Correspondence Between Charles Darwin and the Reverend G V Reed, 1857-1864' in NR 1977-8 vol 32 pp 51-70
